mapper.select: SELECT NVL(f.farm_idx, 0) AS farmIdx, u.user_name AS userName, u.user_phone AS userPhone, u.user_pw AS userPw, TO_CHAR(u.joined_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS joinedAt, f.farm_name AS farmName, f.farm_addr AS farmAddr, f.farm_phone AS farmPhone, f.farm_crops AS farmCrops, f.farm_area AS farmArea, TO_CHAR(f.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS createdAt FROM qc_user u LEFT JOIN qc_farm f ON u.user_phone = f.user_phone ORDER BY f.created_at DESC NULLS LAST

SELECT NVL(f.farm_idx, 0) AS farmIdx, u.user_name AS userName, u.user_phone AS userPhone, u.user_pw AS userPw, TO_CHAR(u.joined_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS joinedAt, f.farm_name AS farmName, f.farm_addr AS farmAddr, f.farm_phone AS farmPhone, f.farm_crops AS farmCrops, f.farm_area AS farmArea, TO_CHAR(f.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS createdAt FROM qc_user u LEFT JOIN qc_farm f ON u.user_phone = f.user_phone WHERE u.user_phone = #{userPhone}
mapper.update: UPDATE qc_farm SET farm_name = #{farmName}, farm_addr = #{farmAddr}, farm_phone = #{farmPhone}, farm_crops = #{farmCrops}, farm_area = #{farmArea} WHERE farm_idx = #{farmIdx}
